name: Ship Delivery Driver
description:
A simple game where you control a ship.

Find the castaway that will always spawn in a random place close to the little three islands and sail back to the safe zone (Green Starting Zone).

Don't touch the Black Pirate Ship.

Simple as that, just keep recovering castaways one by one for increasing score.

Github link: https://github.com/igorbarranca/Ship-Delivery-Driver
